thread.section_title: News24, South Africa's premier news source, provides breaking news on national, world, Africa, sport, entertainment, technology & more.
thread.title: My entertainment gone

author: news24.com
title: My entertainment gone
text: What many have not realised is that the news 24 comments section provides great entertainment. Many of the comments were very funny and insightful.Yes...many were racist and negative but even this was an insight I needed to know. No use denying the polarisation of our nation. The negativity challenged me to make a difference. I will miss the entertainment and insight of the comments...ag pleez hear us and bring them back...
